scripts.___copy:assets: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:images && npm run copy:icons
scripts.___dev: npm run copy:assets && sass src/index.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map --watch | esbuild src/main.js --outfile=dist/main.js --bundle --platform=node --target=esnext --watch
scripts.___prod: npm run copy:assets && sass src/index.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && esbuild src/main.js --outfile=dist/main.js --bundle --platform=node --target=esnext --minify
